TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualPathProvider extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public MustInherit Class VirtualPathProvider Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class VirtualPathProvider abstract : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供了一组方法，使 Web 应用程序可以从虚拟文件系统中检索资源。

span.span: Provides a set of methods that enable a Web application to retrieve resources from a virtual file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一组方法, 用于实现 Web 应用程序的虚拟文件系统。The class provides a set of methods for implementing a virtual file system for a Web application. 在虚拟文件系统中, 文件和目录由服务器操作系统所提供的文件系统以外的数据存储管理。In a virtual file system, the files and directories are managed by a data store other than the file system provided by the server's operating system. 例如, 可以使用虚拟文件系统将内容存储在 SQL Server 数据库中。For example, you can use a virtual file system to store content in a SQL Server database. 可以存储在虚拟文件系统中按请求处理的任何文件。You can store any file that is processed on request in a virtual file system. 这包括：This includes: - ASP.NET 页、母版页、用户控件和其他对象。ASP.NET pages, master pages, user controls, and other objects. - 扩展名为 .htm 和 .jpg 的标准网页。Standard Web pages with extensions such as .htm and .jpg. - 映射到实例的任何自定义扩展。Any custom extension mapped to a instance. - 文件夹中的`App_Theme`任何命名主题。Any named theme in the `App_Theme` folder. 不能将 ASP.NET 应用程序文件夹或文件存储在虚拟文件系统中。You cannot store ASP.NET application folders or files that generate application-level assemblies in a virtual file system. 这包括：This includes: - Global.asax 文件。The Global.asax file. - Web.config 文件。Web.config files. - 使用的站点地图数据文件。Site map data files used by the . - 包含应用程序程序集或生成应用程序程序集`Bin`的`App_Code`目录`App_GlobalResources`:、 `App_LocalResources`、、any。Directories that contain application assemblies or that generate application assemblies: `Bin`, `App_Code`, `App_GlobalResources`, any `App_LocalResources`. - 应用程序数据文件夹`App_Data`。The application data folder, `App_Data`. > [!NOTE] > 如果为部署预编译了某个网站, 则不会编译实例提供的内容, 并且预编译的站点不使用任何实例。If a Web site is precompiled for deployment, content provided by a instance is not compiled, and no instances are used by the precompiled site. ## 注册 VirtualPathProviderRegistering a VirtualPathProvider 自定义实例应通过使用方法在 Web 应用程序执行任何页面分析或编译之前, 使用方法在 ASP.NET 编译系统中进行注册。A custom instance should be registered with the ASP.NET compilation system by using the method before any page parsing or compilation is performed by the Web application. 通常情况下 , 会`AppInitialize`在`App_Code` 目录中`Application_Start`定义的方法中或在文件中的事件过程中注册实例。`Global.asax`Typically, a instance is registered in an `AppInitialize` method defined in the `App_Code` directory, or during the `Application_Start` event in the `Global.asax` file. 有关`AppInitialize`在方法中注册实例的示例, 请参见 "示例" 部分。For an example of registering a instance in an `AppInitialize` method, see the Example section. 你可以在其他事件期间注册实例, 但在注册实例之前编译和缓存的页面将不会失效, 即使新实例现在将为之前的提供源提供已编译页面。You can register a instance during other events, but pages compiled and cached before the instance is registered will not be invalidated, even if the new instance would now provide the source for the previously compiled page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个类实现, 它使用存储在对象中的信息创建虚拟文件系统。The following code example is a class implementation that creates a virtual file system using information stored in a object. 此代码示例使用和类的代码示例, 以从加载到对象的数据存储区中提供虚拟资源。The code example works with the code examples for the and classes to provide virtual resources from a data store that is loaded into a object. 此示例包含四个部分: 类实现、用于填充对象的 XML 数据文件、 `AppStart`包含`AppInitialize`用于将类注册到编译的方法的对象。系统, 以及提供指向虚拟文件的链接的 ASP.NET 页面。This example has four parts: the class implementation, an XML data file used to populate the object, an `AppStart` object that contains an `AppInitialize` method used to register the class with the compilation system, and an ASP.NET page that provides links to the virtual files. 若要在应用程序中使用此示例代码, 请执行以下步骤。To use this sample code in an application, follow these steps. 1. 在 Web 服务器上创建一个示例应用程序。Create a sample application on your Web server. 2. 将自定义对象的源代码 (见下文) 复制到`App_Code`应用程序目录中的文件。Copy the source code for the custom object (see below) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 3. 将自定义对象的源代码 (请参阅类概述主题中的 "示例" 部分) 复制到应用程序`App_Code`目录中的文件。Copy the source code for the custom object (see the Example section in the class overview topic) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 4. 将自定义对象的源代码 (请参阅类概述主题中的 "示例" 部分) 复制到应用程序`App_Code`目录中的文件。Copy the source code for the custom object (see the Example section in the class overview topic) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 5. 将`AppStart`对象的源代码 (见下文) 复制到`App_Code`应用程序目录中的文件。Copy the source code for the `AppStart` object (see below) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 6. 将 XML 数据 (见下文) 复制到`XMLData.xml` `App_Data`应用程序目录中的文件中。Copy the XML data (see below) into a file named `XMLData.xml` into a file in the application's `App_Data` directory. 7. `default.aspx`将文件 (见下文) 复制到示例应用程序的根目录中。Copy the `default.aspx` file (see below) into the root directory of the sample application. 使用 Web 浏览器打开`default.aspx`文件, 然后单击页面上的链接以查看虚拟文件的内容。Use a Web browser to open the `default.aspx` file, and then click the links on the page to see the contents of the virtual files. 第一个示例是自定义类。The first example is a custom class. 重写和方法, 以指示请求的目录是否存在于虚拟文件系统中。 The and methods are overridden to indicate whether a requested directory is present in the virtual file system. 重写和方法, 以返回包含虚拟文件系统中的信息的自定义和实例。 The and methods are overridden to return custom and instances containing information from the virtual file system. 类还提供`GetVirtualData`了 和类用于访问包含虚拟文件系统数据的对象的方法。The class also provides a `GetVirtualData` method used by the and classes to access the object containing the virtual file system data. 在生产实现中, 通常会在负责与数据存储区交互的业务对象中实现此方法。In a production implementation, this method would typically be implemented in a business object responsible for interacting with the data store. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#20)] 第二个示例是用于填充自定义 对象返回的对象的 XML 数据文件。The second example is the XML data file used to populate the object returned by the custom object. 此 XML 数据用于演示如何使用、 和对象从外部数据中检索数据, 而不用于表示生产质量的数据存储区。This XML data is used to demonstrate using the , , and objects to retrieve data from external data and is not intended to represent a production-quality data store. ``` ``` 第三个示例提供`AppStart`一个`AppInitialize`包含方法的对象。The third example provides an `AppStart` object that contains an `AppInitialize` method. 此方法在 ASP.NET 应用程序的初始化过程中调用, 以执行所需的任何自定义初始化。This method is called during the initialization of an ASP.NET application to perform any custom initialization required. 在这种情况下, 它会向 ASP.NET 生成系统注册自定义对象。In this case, it registers the custom object with the ASP.NET build system. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/AppStart.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/AppStart.vb#10)] 最后一个示例是一个 ASP.NET 页面, 其中包含指向虚拟文件系统中包含的虚拟文件的链接。The last example is an ASP.NET page that contains links to the virtual files contained in the virtual file system. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

block.para:
当从继承时, 必须重写以下成员:When you inherit from , you must override the following members: -
-
如果自定义类支持虚拟文件系统中的目录, 则必须重写以下成员。If your custom class supports directories in the virtual file system, you must override the following members.
-
-
如果虚拟文件系统将包含该网站的主题 (通过创建一个虚拟App_Themes目录), 则您的自定义类必须支持目录。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual App_Themes directory), your custom class must support directories.
自定义类适用于从和类派生的类。A custom class works with classes derived from the and classes. 你应从这些类型实现派生类, 以提供虚拟文件系统中的文件和目录信息。You should implement derived classes from these types to provide file and directory information from your virtual file system. 有关自定义实现的示例, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For an example of a custom implementation, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 有关自定义实现的示例, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For an example of a custom implementation, see the Example section of the class overview topic.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化该类供继承的类实例使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

span.span: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当重写构造函数时, 延迟在将 对象注册到方法之后必须发生的任何初始化。When overriding the constructor, defer any initialization that must occur after the object is registered to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是初始化自定义 类的构造函数的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the constructor that initializes a custom class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string CombineVirtualPaths (string basePath, string relativePath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CombineVirtualPaths(string basePath, string relativePath) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CombineVirtualPaths (basePath As String, relativePath As String) As String
public: virtual System::String ^ CombineVirtualPaths(System::String ^ basePath, System::String ^ relativePath);
abstract member CombineVirtualPaths : string * string -> string override this.CombineVirtualPaths : string * string -> string

span.span: The base path for the application.

param.name: relativePath
param.span: 虚拟资源相对于基路径的路径。

span.span: The path to the virtual resource, relative to the base path.

summary.span: 将基路径与相对路径组合，以返回某虚拟资源的完整路径。

span.span: Combines a base path with a relative path to return a complete path to a virtual resource.
The complete path to a virtual resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法检查虚拟资源的相对路径的内容, 并执行所需的任何修改。Use the method to inspect the contents of a relative path to a virtual resource and perform any modifications required. 默认实现根据标准 ASP.NET `basePath`路径`relativePath`处理组合和参数。The default implementation combines the `basePath` and `relativePath` parameters according to standard ASP.NET path processing.

para.span: 如果重写方法的默认实现, 则需要将具有参数的任何特殊语法转换为有效的虚拟路径。

span.span: If you override the default implementation of the method, you are required to convert any special syntax with the parameter to a valid virtual path.

para.span: 你需要负责语法检查、路径验证和处理格式不正确的输入, 以及适用于格式正确输入的边缘事例。

span.span: You are responsible for syntax checking, path validation, and handling malformed input, as well as edge cases for well-formed input.

para.span: 在大多数情况下, 不需要重写默认方法。

span.span: In most cases it will not be necessary to override the default method.

para.span: 但是, 如果确实需要修改路径, 建议限制实现, 以在参数中修改特定于虚拟路径提供程序的标记, 然后调用基实现以执行正常ASP.NET 路径处理

span.span: However, if you do need to modify the path, we recommend that you limit your implementation to modifying tokens specific to your virtual path provider in the parameter, and that you then call the base implementation to perform normal ASP.NET path processing

span.span: The path to the virtual directory.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示目录是否存在于虚拟文件系统中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a directory exists in the virtual file system.

returns.span: 如果该目录存在于虚拟文件系统中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the directory exists in the virtual file system; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写`virtualDir` 方法, 以向编译系统指示所表示的资源存在于此实例提供的虚拟文件系统中。 Override the method to indicate to the compilation system that the resource represented by `virtualDir` exists in the virtual file system provided by this instance. 如果自定义类不支持目录, 则该方法应返回`false`。If your custom class does not support directories, the method should return `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果虚拟文件系统将包含网站的主题 (通过创建虚拟`App_Themes`目录), 则您的自定义类必须支持目录。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual `App_Themes` directory), your custom class must support directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是自定义 类中方法的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#22)]

span.span: The path to the primary virtual resource.

param.name: virtualPathDependencies

summary.span: 基于指定的虚拟路径创建一个缓存依赖项。

returns.span: 指定虚拟资源的 对象。

span.span: A object for the specified virtual resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的默认实现返回`null`。The default implementation of the method returns `null`. 若要缓存虚拟资源以供以后使用, 必须重写方法或方法。To cache virtual resources for later use you must override either the method or the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现自定义类的方法。The following code example implements the method for a custom class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. returns.span: 所指定虚拟资源的缓存键。

span.span: A cache key for the specified virtual resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法为虚拟资源提供自定义缓存键。Use the method to provide a custom cache key for virtual resources. 如果不重写方法, 则将虚拟路径用于缓存键。If you do not override the method, the virtual path is used for the cache key.

para.span: 如果基于虚拟路径创建缓存密钥, 则仅重写默认方法对于应用程序不起作用。

span.span: Only override the default method if creating a cache key based on the virtual path will not work for your application.

span.span: The path to the virtual directory.

summary.span: 从虚拟文件系统中获取一个虚拟目录。

span.span: Gets a virtual directory from the virtual file system.

returns.span: 类的子代，表示虚拟文件系统中的一个目录。

span.span: A descendent of the class that represents a directory in the virtual file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回类的子代, 该类包含`virtualDir`参数中指定的目录中包含的文件和目录。 The method returns a descendent of the class that contains the file and directories contained in the directory specified in the `virtualDir` parameter. 如果自定义类不支持目录, 则该方法应返回`null`。If your custom class does not support directories, the method should return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果虚拟文件系统将包含网站的主题 (通过创建虚拟`App_Themes`目录), 则您的自定义类必须支持目录。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual `App_Themes` directory), your custom class must support directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是自定义 类中方法的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: A descendent of the class that represents a file in the virtual file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回类的子代, 该类表示`virtualPath`参数指定的文件。 The method returns a descendent of the class that represents the file specified by the `virtualPath` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是自定义 类中方法的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: A hash of the specified virtual paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可提供虚拟文件系统资源的依赖项哈希。Use the method to provide a hash of the dependencies for a virtual-file-system resource.

span.span: Initializes the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 ASP.NET 编译系统注册提供程序后, 将调用方法。The method is called after the provider is registered with the ASP.NET compilation system. 方法用于提供将实例置于应用程序所占用的环境中后所需的任何初始化。 The method is used to provide any initialization required after the instance is placed into the environment the application occupies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是从应用程序的 实例设置数据文件路径的方法的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the method that sets the path to a data file from the application's instance. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#26)]

summary.span: 通过阻止创建租约给予 对象无限的生存期。

span.span: Gives the object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会重写其基类中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它始终返回`null` , 从而防止创建将限制对象生存期的租约。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the object's lifetime.

span.span: The path to the virtual file.

summary.span: 从虚拟文件返回一个流。

span.span: Returns a stream from a virtual file.

returns.span: 所指定虚拟文件或资源的只读 对象。

span.span: A read-only object for the specified virtual file or resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是一种便捷方法, 使你可以从虚拟文件获取流, 而无需创建实例。The method is a convenience method that enables you to get a stream from a virtual file without creating a instance.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对编译系统中以前注册的 对象的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a previously registered object in the compilation system.

value.span: 编译系统中的下一个 对象。

span.span: The next object in the compilation system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向 ASP.NET 编译系统注册对象时,会将该对象添加到提供程序链中。When a object is registered with the ASP.NET compilation system, it is added to a chain of providers. 如果此 实例未提供请求的路径,请使用属性将处理方式移交给链中的上一个对象。Use the property to hand processing off to the previous object in the chain if the requested path is not provided by this instance. 路径提供程序链始终以默认的 ASP.NET 提供程序结尾, 该提供程序可提供文件系统中的文件。The chain of path providers always ends with the default ASP.NET provider, which serves files from the file system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是方法的实现。The following code example is an implementation of the method. 如果请求的虚拟目录不以字符串`"/vrdir"`开头, 则方法将使用属性将请求传递给链中的下一个对象。If the requested virtual directory does not begin with the string `"/vrdir"`, the method uses the property to pass the request to the next object in the chain. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#23)]
